summary: Comprehensive testing of SusuFlow fintech application completed. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend functionality mostly working with one modal overlay issue affecting some interactions.

resolved_issues.issue: JWT token validation failing due to integer subject in token
resolved_issues.fix_applied: Updated auth.py to use string for JWT subject and handle conversion in get_current_user

ui_bugs.issue: Modal overlay remains open after form submission, blocking subsequent interactions
affected_flows: Group card clicks after modal interactions
ui_bugs.workaround: Page refresh or navigation clears the overlay

passed_tests: User login and JWT token generation
Deposit money via mock Hubtel integration
Contribute to group from personal wallet
Frontend groups page and group creation

success_percentage.frontend: 85% (Most functionality working, modal overlay issue affects some interactions)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix modal overlay issue in Dialog components. The modal overlay (DialogOverlay) remains open after form submissions, preventing subsequent button clicks. This affects withdraw functionality and group card interactions after using modals. Consider adding proper modal state management or z-index fixes.
